step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Good hold. Remember to maintain that upright posture.
You're returning to the start position. Focus on a smooth reversal of the motion.
Second rep, starting with hands clasped in your lap. Good.
You're raising your hands again. Ensure your elbows stay relatively close as you move them up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head steady and avoid leaning forward.
Good hold. Maintain good posture throughout.
You're returning to the starting position. Try to make this movement as controlled as the outward motion.

exercise_summary: Great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! You're doing a good job of raising and spreading your hands. Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and maintain an upright head position throughout.
